column4: Can I install Ubuntu Netbook Remix on any laptop? Or is it strictly for netbooks?
good question , the netbook is also a laptop
yes it is... so then why do they call netbooks netbooks instead of laptops?
marketing nonsense
haha
but wait let me double check
so can I install netbook remix on 'regular' laptops not designated as 'netbook's
wait 1 moment iam checking what a netbook is :)
tell me what you have
i have a HP Pavilion dv1000 (pretty old but still alive)
is that a netbook?
i am currently running xubuntu on it...
nope, not a netbook
ok i dont recommend installing it
the unr is optimised for newer power saving chips in netbooks so it may not work correctly on urs
which os did your netbook come wwith?
netbook remix should work well on that mini
my netbook came with windows xp pro sp3 initially but i recently installed UNR because it started lagging too much.. yeah UNR works way better than the os pre installed
and now you want to try it on the old hp? am i right?
if it has 512 mb ram its worth a try i think :)
i wonder whether it can be installed on a desktop :P
